channel.title: Conference on Yet Another Geographer
channel.description: Recent content in Conference on Yet Another Geographer

item.title: GISRUK I: CDRC Brexit Analysis Competition
item.description: My entry in the Consumer Data Research Center’s Brexit Data Competition is called “Tension Points: A Theory & Evidence”, which I talked about at the 2018 GISRUK conference There is an abstract describing some of the work that I submitted to get to the final round, but if you’re computationally inclined, you’ll find everything sufficient to replicate my modelling & analysis in this Jupyter Notebook (raw). You’ll need scikit-learn, pystan, statsmodels, and geopandas at minimum to run.
